folder: Richmond Avenue & Dock Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Avenue, west side, about 300 yards south of Dock Road, showing the B. N.. Du Pay farm (Beers's 1874 map).
March 25, 1927
P. L. Sperr

folder: Dock Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Dock Road - Richmond Hill Road
text:
New Springville Park (Staten Island): Viewing north across the salt meadows watered by Springville Creek, and showing one of Staten Islend's water pumping plants near Travis Avenue. The vantage point is near Dock Road, at Richmond Hill Road.
May 6, 19P9
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Avenue & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Richmond Hill Road
text:
Richmond Avenue, east side, about 300 yards north of Richmond HEill Road. This house was owned by M. Simonson in 1874; by Neuben Miller from 1898 to 1907, and by William
Eith in 1917.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Avenue & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Richmond Hill Road
text:
Richmond Avenue, east side, about 250 feet north of Richmond Hill Road. The house and farmland were owned by O. N. Melvin from 1898 to 1907; later by W. Haughwout. The view is from Richmond Hill Road.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the house as seen from Richmond Avenue. It is at this date.(1937) the Staten Island
Plant Nursery.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Road, above Egbertville.
May 1, 1932
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Avenue & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Richmond Hill Road
text:
Richmond Avenue, north from Richmond Hill Road.
May 10, 1937
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Perine House, 1476 Richmond Road, Staten Island.
